ygData.subject: feign death
ygData.msgSnippet: Out of curiosity, Has anyone tried to stack DoT s then feign death. Should that not do the extra damage since the monster would be withing melee range for more
ygData.messageBody:
Out of curiosity, Has anyone tried to stack DoT's then feign death.
Should that not do the extra damage since the monster would be withing
melee range for more then 18 seconds and not moving.
I was thinking something like DoT's feign death, wait, get up, shadow
step, DoT' feign death, critter dead.
Now, does DoT make the critter see through feign death??

Darkmoon level 15 necromancer

Just trying to think of new strategies for using my spells from level
16. Besides, what else am I going to do at work. ;)
